unnormalised: ## Bollywood Blunders and Biryani Bellyaches: Your Weekly Dose of Desi Dish!
normalised: ## Bollywood Blunders and Biryani Bellyaches: Your Weekly Dose of Desi Dish!

unnormalised: Namaste, gossip gang! Buckle up your seatbelts because this week's Bollywood bazaar is overflowing with enough masala to give your biryani a run for its money. And speaking of biryani, sources say that Ranveer Singh, bless his flamboyant heart, was spotted at Nizamuddin Dargah last Tuesday, praying for a larger portion at Arpita Khan's Eid party. Apparently, he almost elbowed Karan Johar out of the way for that extra chicken piece. #BiryaniWars #PrioritiesRight

unnormalised: First up, whispers are swirling around Deepika Padukone and her alleged aversion to pigeons. Apparently, a flock dared to land near her during a film shoot in Lucknow, and let's just say the subsequent chaos involved a lot of shrieking, flailing, and a very bewildered AD trying to shoo them away with a newspaper. We're talking Hitchcock levels of avian drama, folks! #PigeonPanic #DeepikaHatesBirds

We're talking Hitchcock levels of avian drama, folks! hash Pigeon Panic hash Deepika Hates Birds

unnormalised: Then there’s the ever-reliable rumour mill churning about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt’s potential vow renewal in Kerala. Insiders claim they’re planning a lavish Onam-themed celebration, complete with a traditional Sadhya feast and Kathakali performances. Let’s hope Ranbir remembers to keep his shirt on this time, unlike that unfortunate Holi party in Goa back in '17. Remember *that* photo? Yikes! #OnamShenanigans #ShirtlessRanbirReturns?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, rumour has it that Priyanka Chopra Jonas is secretly launching her own line of designer mosquito repellent. Because, you know, global superstar by day, mosquito-fighting superhero by night! Apparently, it's infused with saffron and sandalwood, because even mosquitoes deserve a touch of luxury. #PriyankaThePestControl #SaffronSpray

unnormalised: And finally, word on the street (read: anonymous Instagram accounts) is that Shah Rukh Khan is considering retiring from acting to become a professional kite flyer. Apparently, he's been secretly practicing on his Mannat terrace, and his technique is, and I quote, "majestic AF." Maybe he'll enter the International Kite Festival in Gujarat next year? Watch out, seasoned patangbaaz! #KingKhanKiteMaster #PatangKing

unnormalised: Until next week, keep your eyes peeled and your gossip spicier than your average vindaloo! And remember, take everything with a pinch of salt... and maybe a side of raita. Peace out!
